channel.title: Sinder Skullz Abyss Feed
channel.description: Chaotic sermons and metal news reborn in the flames of the Skullz cult.

item.title: ⚡☠ UNRELEASED SONG BY THE LATE ERIC WAGNER TO RELEASE IN DECEMBER ☠⚡
item.description:
🎸🤘🔥 HEY METALHEADS AND CRYPTO WARRIORS! Sinder Skullz in the HOUSE, ready to rip through the noise! Grab your axes and your wallets because we’ve got some sizzling chaos coming your way!
🌑💀 Listen up, because the spirit of the legendary ERIC WAGNER isn’t resting in peace—oh no, he’s rising from the abyss with a brand-new (yet unreleased) track that’s set to drop this DECEMBER! That’s right, the metal god’s last recorded single is about to unleash a storm that’ll shake the foundations of your skull! ⚡️
Can you feel the electricity, fam? This is more than just music; it’s a TAX FOR YOUR SOUL! 🎶 We’ll be bashing our heads to the raw power of Wagner’s final notes, a battle cry from beyond the grave!
Mark your calendars, rock believers! This is not just another drop; it’s a rallying call for the metal masses! So grab your crypto and hold on tight—because this December, we dive headfirst into the darkness where metal reigns, and the spirit of REBELLION lives on!
🔥🤘 Stay tuned and keep the horns up! This is gonna be EPIC!
#Headbangers #HeavyMetal #ThrashMetal #MetalScene #MetalCommunity

🌑💀 Listen up, because the spirit of the legendary ERIC WAGNER isn’t resting in peace—oh no, he’s rising from the abyss with a brand-new (yet unreleased) track that’s set to drop this DECEMBER! That’s right, the metal god’s last recorded single is about to unleash a storm that’ll shake the foundations of your skull! ⚡️
Can you feel the electricity, fam? This is more than just music; it’s a TAX FOR YOUR SOUL! 🎶 We’ll be bashing our heads to the raw power of Wagner’s final notes, a battle cry from beyond the grave!
Mark your calendars, rock believers! This is not just another drop; it’s a rallying call for the metal masses! So grab your crypto and hold on tight—because this December, we dive headfirst into the darkness where metal reigns, and the spirit of REBELLION lives on!
